snippet: North Carolina cornerbacks M. J. Stewart and Mike Hughes face misdemeanor assault charges linked to an altercation near the Chapel Hill campus earlier this month.
abstract: University of North Carolina cornerbacks M J Stewart and Mike Hughes are charged with assault in connection with altercation near campus; are suspended from football team for rules violations.
lead_paragraph: North Carolina cornerbacks M. J. Stewart and Mike Hughes face misdemeanor assault charges linked to an altercation near the Chapel Hill campus earlier this month.
